item.name: Age of Empires III: The Age of Discovery
Appels en Peren
item.conditiontext: barely used copy, for trade or sale (make me an offer)

item.name: Arkham Horror
item.comment: If you dig the horror theme and co-op concept this is definably the game for you. The game tends to make you feel overwhelmed, hopeless and that it is extremely difficult to defeat the overlord. When you do get there it gives a very rewarding feeling finally defeating to overlord. Expect a long game with lots of theme. Recommend this game!

item.name: Axis & Allies
item.comment: Great "oldy" wargame with some new additions opposed to the original. Like to play this game as a 2 player game instead of multiplayer.
item.conditiontext: New, out of shrinkwrap, unpunched, trade interest low.

item.name: Axis & Allies
item.comment: seen 2 play's

item.name: Axis & Allies Air Force Miniatures: Angels 20
Axis & Allies Naval Miniatures: War at Sea
Battlefleet Gothic
item.comment: Warhammer in space ;) I love space games so when opportunity arise I jumped on this game. Sadly enough cannot find a lot of players that are into miniature games. Like warhammer this game has great potential to become a pretty costly investment ;) All in all great theme, great miniatures if you can control the "collector" urge great game :)
item.conditiontext:
For sale (€250,- euro) or trade.
Contains: -Starter set (complete base set including 8 ships) -3 extra Chaos ships -3 extra Imperial ships -1x blackstone fortress -1x emperor battleship -1x desolator battleship -3x Chaos escorts -3x Imperial escorts -1x Dauntless -bunch of ordnance fighters and bomber mini's
Box has some shelf wear and the boxlid is torn in one corner. Mini's are assembled and partly painted to a decent standard/ part in black primer.
item.wantpartslist: Looking for empire, chaos ships, orbital defences, space stations and such. Perhaps another fleet if the price is right ;)

item.name: Battlestar Galactica
item.comment:
Omg, the very first "traitor" game I ever played, and what an experience.. Tabletalk is highly encouraged which greatly enhances the gaming experience. It is not a problem if you did not watch any of the TV series but it does come in handy if you already know some of the background and game fluff. The game can tend to be a bit on the long side (about 4 hour game for a player game) but much worth it.
Great game and must have in any boardgame collection.

item.name: Blood Bowl: Team Manager – The Card Game
Bunny Hop
item.conditiontext:
for trade or sale.
Plz take a look at my for trade list perhaps we could put together a nice kiddy game pack ;)

item.name: Burgers' Zoo
item.comment: Enjoyable game for casual play with the kids.
item.conditiontext: Language dependency: "No necessary in-game text". Seen 2 play's.

item.name: Chaos in the Old World
item.comment: Lot off theme and great component quality in the warhammer world. At first glance (and play) people tent to think there is not much strategy involved and that some chaos-gods are overpowered. After a few plays you'll find this game to be extremely well balanced. Lots of strategy and different ways to victory. Greatly recommend this game!

item.name: Chaos in the Old World: The Horned Rat Expansion
item.comment: Great addition to the base game which gives all races new cards and alternate paths to victory. If you liked the base game this is a no brainer.

item.name: Conquest of Planet Earth: The Space Alien Game
Dark Darker Darkest
item.conditiontext:
New in shrink
For sale or trade.

item.name: Descent: Journeys in the Dark
item.comment: Behamot from FFG with a lot of great looking components. Played with a game master. Heroes can be pretty much invincible after a few turns which can be a bit of a letdown.
item.conditiontext:
In excellent condition. Official errata marked on the cards (about 5 cards I think).
Trade interest low.

item.name: Descent: Journeys in the Dark (Second Edition)
Diggity Dog
item.comment: Started playing this game with my 2.5 years old. She finds it hard not to meddle with other players pieces. Also has an urge to switch the bones to a position that suits her better. Well need a bit more practice mainting the rules iot looks like, otherwise nice game for kids.
item.conditiontext:
good condition, for trade or sale (make me an offer)
Plz take a look at my for trade list perhaps we could put together a nice kiddy game pack ;)

item.name: Doom: The Boardgame
item.conditiontext: Game is complete and in good condition, couple of mini's are painted to a decent standard. For trade or sale (make me an offer).

item.name: Dreadfleet
item.conditiontext: As new condition, partly painted to a very good standard.

item.name: Dreamblade
item.conditiontext: Complete base set and expansion Baxtars war. Complete en in good condition.

item.name: Duel of Ages Set 1: Worldspanner
item.comment: Hilarious combo's of characters and items/weapons. Nice gameplay. Visually not very appealing, component qualitty is poor.
item.conditiontext: Sleeved, trade interest medium

item.name: Dungeon Twister
item.comment: Great game concept, all strategy and nearly no luck involved. The collectible ed. adds great miniatures from fenryll which inhances the gaming experience imho.
item.conditiontext: Collectors edition with miniatures, German language. Miniatures are partly painted to a high standard. Trade interest medium

item.name: Dungeons & Dragons: Wrath of Ashardalon Board Game
Dust Tactics
item.comment: Amazing components, great theme and great diversity in unit stats/ability's. This game is all about skirmishing. A typical scenario takes about 20 minutes which is a great plus point for me. Game play is pretty straightforward but not a problem for the Ameritrash admirers. If you like mini's and skirmish games this game is a must buy for you.
item.conditiontext:
Insert of the gamebox is missing to fit all the assembled (unpainted) miniatures into the box otherwise in very good condition.
For trade or sale (make me an offer)

item.name: Eufraat & Tigris
item.conditiontext: 999 games version, language dependancy low, trade interest medium

item.name: A Game of Thrones: The Board Game (Second Edition)
A Game of Thrones: The Card Game
item.conditiontext: Only seen a couple of plays. Components in very god state. Trade interest high

item.name: Gulo Gulo
item.comment: Started playing this game with my daughter when she was 2 years old. Great game for teaching to recognize colors and concentration skills. Enjoyable for adults becouse the little ones can actually beat you because of their smaller fingers to grab the eggs.
item.conditiontext:
Good condition. for trade or sale (make me an offer)
Plz take a look at my for trade list perhaps we could put together a nice kiddy game pack ;)

item.name: Heroscape Master Set: Rise of the Valkyrie
Hive
item.comment: Great tactical game with a short playtime. The wife enjoys this game very much. Dare I say its better then chess (?) :)

item.name: Hive: The Ladybug
item.comment: Great addition to the base game. Ladybug can walk over other pieces (like the beetle) but cannot end movement on top of another piece.
item.conditiontext: New, unpunched, trade interest low

item.name: Hive: The Mosquito
item.comment: Mosquito can use the "power" of another piece which it is adjacent to. In our plays this basically becomes another ant piece but perhaps out tactical minds are just a bit narrow :) Ok addition to the base game.
item.conditiontext: New, unpunched. trade interest medium

item.name: Hoogspanning
item.comment: Great Euro game. I am of the calculator generation, this game sharpens my calculating skills a bit ;)
item.conditiontext: Dutch edition, new in shrink.

item.name: Hoogspanning: Uitbreiding Benelux
item.comment: More powerplants, tactical choices and another mappiece. Nice addition to the basegame.
item.conditiontext: New in shrinkwrap, trade interest high

item.comment: the kids love this game

item.name: Jakkiebak! Kippenkak!
item.comment: Memory game with a twist. Started playing this with my 2 years old and had some good times with it. At that age can tend to be a bit to long of game so I'd recommend tweaking the "memory pile" a bit.
item.conditiontext:
for trade or sale (make me an offer)
Plz take a look at my for trade list perhaps we could put together a nice kiddy game pack ;)

item.name: Jyhad
item.comment: Though the base game (Jyhad) has some printing errors and cards which are not always that clear to understand it is a great (ccg) card game and probably the best multiplayer card game I ever played. The game realy shines in a 5 player game but 4 player is also very enjoyable.
item.conditiontext:
Jyhad limited edition cards (not VTES)
About 1600 cards (incl. a copy of all the vampires), lots or rares and uncommons. PM me for a detailed list.
Trade interest medium.

item.name: King of Tokyo
item.comment: With the right mindset and ppl great and quick party game.

item.comment: Not much skill involved but very funny and enjoyable (for a short time) to play with the kids.
item.conditiontext:
for trade or sale (make me an offer)

item.name: The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game
The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game
item.comment: My first (real) venture into LCG games. Love this game and the adventure packs that go with it. To stop the collector urge I force myself to play every scenario at least 2 times before buying another expansion pack. Can also be played solo which is a plus for me.
item.conditiontext: Sleeved with Dragon Shield sleeves

item.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – A Journey to Rhosgobel
The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – Conflict at the Carrock
The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – Return to Mirkwood
The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – The Dead Marshes
The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – The Hills of Emyn Muil
The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – The Hunt for Gollum
Mage Knight Board Game
item.comment:
Game which reminds me of the computer game "heroes of might and magic". It has some deckbuilding, questing and PvP in the game. This game also reminds me (a little bit) of World of warcraft the boardgame which I mainly loved becouse of the questing and lvl-ing.
Great questing game, highly recommended.

item.name: Mansions of Madness
item.comment: Absolutely love this game. I play this game a lot with the wife with an automated keeper variant (available in the file section). Its basically a story driven game where the investigators explore a mansion but (at the start) do not know exactly what their objective is. As the game progresses clues appear and your goal slowly becomes clear. Since you are under constant attack by creatures and events it is a real nail biting experience. The game could definably use future (story) expansions to add to the re-playability. If you like games like descent and dig the horror (arkham horror) theme I highly recommend this game.

item.name: Memoir '44
item.comment: The "command and colors" game system is great. Love the historical background and card driven actions. Some people find that they have to little influence in tactical decision making because of the card driven actions. I'm not one off them :) Great light 2 player wargame.

item.name: Mob Ties: The Board Game
item.comment: Low interest

item.name: Mr. Jack in New York
item.comment: One of the favorites of my wife. A very quick game which requires some puzzle solving skills. This game pretty much always goes with us on holidays.

item.name: Munchkin
item.comment: After a few plays when the "laughable" factor of the cards is gone the game really starts to annoy me because of the gameplay. Nice party game but do not expect a serious game here.
item.conditiontext: PS games, Dutch language

item.name: Neuroshima Hex!
item.comment: Got this on my Ipad as a free to try version. Bought the full version on my Ipad and after that the boardgame in Essen 2011. Loads of tactical depth and skill involved. The different factions really have their own feel to it. I cannt find alot of ppl how want to play this game with me so the Ipad version is still played regularly ;)
item.conditiontext:
Seen 1 play.
For trade or sale (make me an offer)

item.name: Nightfall
item.conditiontext: Very good condition

item.name: Ninja: Legend of the Scorpion Clan
Nuns on the Run
item.comment: My first hidden movement game. After a couple of turns you quickly get the hang of it. Great for gaming groups with 6 players who want to play a game together.
item.conditiontext: for trade or sale (make me an offer)

item.name: Panic Station
item.comment:
The second traitor game (after battlestar galactica) I ever played. I'm really starting to become a fan of the genre ;) Plz do not try to play this with ppl who do not like traitor games or do not want to engage in some tabletalk, they will most likely ruin the gaming experience for everyone on the table.
The Englisch and Dutch rulebook contradict each-other at some fronts and a few rules are not that clearly explained in the rulebook. When you get the hang of it, this is a great game which can be played in a pretty short time.
item.conditiontext: sleeved

item.name: Panic Station: Survival Kit Mini Expansion
item.conditiontext: sleeved, only for trade together with the base set

item.name: Puerto Rico
item.comment: Solid euro game that scores the nr 1 or 2 spot for best game on BGG for a good reason ;)
item.conditiontext: Ravensburger version, Dutch language

item.name: Race for the Galaxy
item.comment: Has puerto rico elements in it (the primary/secondary ability of action cards). You basically build a space empire and try to score the most victory points. I have not played this game with the expansions yet. Base game imho lacks player interaction which is partly fixed in expansions. If you like puerto rico, card games and space theme this is a great game for you whci you can pay within an hour.
item.conditiontext: Sleeved, will only trade together with the expansions which are all in the same (base game) box.

item.name: Race for the Galaxy: Rebel vs Imperium
item.conditiontext: Sleeved, will only trade together with the base game and other expansions which are all in the same (base game) box.

item.name: Race for the Galaxy: The Brink of War
item.conditiontext: Sleeved, since it was stored together with my base game the original box is missing. Otherwise complete.

item.name: Race for the Galaxy: The Gathering Storm
item.conditiontext: Sleeved, will only trade together with the base game and other expansions which are all in the same (base game) box.

item.name: Rampage
item.conditiontext: includes space cowboy promo

item.name: Return of the Heroes
item.comment: In the same category as prophecy and talisman but less popular or known. Very enjoyable "questing" game.
item.conditiontext: German language, language dependency low. Trade interest high. Will only trade this together with the expansion Grahlsuche.

item.name: Rex: Final Days of an Empire
Risk: The Lord of the Rings
Roll Through the Ages: The Bronze Age
Runebound (Tweede Editie)
item.comment: Love the theme and unique movement system (dice driven terrain types). Can be a pretty long game. Dropped in my ratings because of better alternatives which scratches the same itch and has the same playtime.
item.conditiontext: PS games, Dutch language, seen 1 play

item.name: Runewars
item.comment: Great component quality and visually appealing game. Love the fantasy theme, and "empire building" concept. Mixes several concepts from other games to a very enjoyable game. Not sure about the card driven combat concept ("dice in disguise" why not use dice then..) but it works.
item.conditiontext:
In excellent condition (only seen a couple of plays)
for trade or sale (make me an offer)

item.name: Serpent's Tongue
item.conditiontext: -->Looking to trade/buy booster boxes.

item.name: Sid Meier's Civilization: The Board Game
item.comment: Loved the PC game but that does not mean a boardgame is an instant win for me. Did not like the old sid meijer boardgame but this version definably hits the sweet spot ;) There is a lot of bookkeeping and switching around player aids, rulebook and techcards also playtime can be pretty long with a new group. Otherwise a great game which I greatly enjoy playing. If you liked the PC game this is a no brainer and "must buy" for you ;)
item.conditiontext: Trade interest low

item.name: Small World
item.comment: Use this game as a gateway game for new players. Not to simple, not to complex but very enjoyable.

item.name: Space Hulk (third edition)
item.comment: Enjoyable game but imho way to much hyped by players of the original game.

item.name: Spartacus: A Game of Blood & Treachery
Het Spel der Tronen
item.conditiontext: PS games/FFG, Dutch language. Out of shrinkwrap, unpunched Trade interest high.

item.name: StarCraft: The Board Game
item.comment: Would probably rate this game even higher when I would have played this with the right gaming group. It is a long game with lots of rules and components but boy does it has some beef to it. It pretty much boils down to Twilight Imperium without the politics. Brood war expansion highly recommended to play with.
item.conditiontext:
Will only trade (or sell) this together with brood war expansion.
Trade interest low, for a good offer might be willing to trade or sell (plz no bogus trade offers, you guys know its a rare game) ;)

item.name: StarCraft: The Board Game – Brood War Expansion
item.conditiontext: Will only trade this with the base game. Trade interest low.

item.name: Super Dungeon Explore
item.comment: Strongly recommend this game for 4 player game (max 3 heroes, 1 consul player). Great hack and slash game which brings me back to the good old Zelda/ console game days.

item.name: Tannhäuser

item.name: Tannhäuser Revised Edition Rulebook
item.conditiontext: New, unused, trade interest low, will only trade this together with the base game

item.name: Thunderstone
item.comment: Game very much like Domininion. Like the game and theme quite a bit also appreciate the non-collectible nature of the game which does not force me to by random booster packs and such. Only disadvantage of the game is the lack of player interaction which is partly corrected in expansions as I understand it.
item.conditiontext:
Sleeved. Sleeves are a little bit bend at the top (all of them) because of the odd shaped box insert (commonly known issue). Otherwise in excellent condition.
€20,- BIN price

item.name: Thunderstone: Dragonspire
item.comment: Even better than the original base game because it incorporates some expansion abilities.
item.conditiontext: sleeved

item.name: Thunderstone: For the Dwarf Promo
item.comment: Nice addition but not to special a character imho.

item.name: Tic-Tac-Toe
item.comment: Who doesn't know his one.. and next to that own it as a boardgame.. :)

item.name: Tide of Iron
item.comment: Low interest

item.name: Tipsy Tower
item.comment: Started playing this game with my 2.5 year old who really likes this game.

item.name: A Touch of Evil: The Supernatural Game
item.comment:
Very much a game like Arkham Horror (AH) with a few game play differences here and there. Game length is about the same. Can be played in competitive or co-op mode which is a plus for me. Also really like the "secrets" mechanism for town elders.
The "standard game" feels a bit slow and is a bit to repetitive for my taste. If I have to choose between a game of AtoE or AH, AH wins for me.
item.conditiontext: CD is missing
item.wishlistcomment: looking for the original CD that came with the game

item.name: Twilight Imperium (Third Edition)
item.comment: Love the theme, love the complexity and strategic choices you have to make. Component quality is very good and you really get a lot for your money. If you don't mind a long game (about 9 hours for a 4 player game) this is a real pearl. Greatly recommended!

item.name: Twilight Struggle
item.comment: looking for deluxe edition

item.name: War of Honor
item.conditiontext: Will only trade this together with my L5R cards which is a great addition to this game.

item.name: War of the Ring (first edition)
item.comment: Rulebook is a real b*tch to read and learn from. Recommend that someone who played this game teach it to you. After getting the hang of the rules this really is a great tactical game to play.
item.conditiontext: Phalanx, Dutch language, trade interest medium. Will only trade this together with the expansion.

item.name: Warhammer Quest
item.comment: Great RPG-boardgame hybrid (and currently the only RPG-ish game in my collection). The warhammer world always interested me so the jump to this game was not that hard for me :) Game is OOP but occasionally founded on ebay.
item.conditiontext:
In excellent condition, base game with all components included. About 5 miniatures are painted, cards are sleeved. Including treasure pack 1, 2 and 3.
Trade interest low, for a good offer might be willing to trade or sell (plz no bogus trade offers, you guys know its a rare game) ;)
